org.ldaptive.handler
Class AbstractSearchEntryHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.ldaptive.handler.AbstractSearchEntryHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Handler<SearchRequest,SearchEntry>, SearchEntryHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractBinaryAttributeHandler, CaseChangeEntryHandler, DnAttributeEntryHandler, MergeAttributeEntryHandler, RangeEntryHandler, RecursiveEntryHandler
public abstract class AbstractSearchEntryHandler
extends Object
implements SearchEntryHandler

Base class for entry handlers which simply returns values unaltered.

Version:
$Revision: 2885 $ $Date: 2014-02-05 16:28:49 -0500 (Wed, 05 Feb 2014) $
Author:
Middleware Services
